node.title: Gold Coast must lift jab 'game', Palaszczuk says, as schoolies vax hubs considered
node.alt: A throng of teenagers hitting the town at night.,
node.description: The Premier has taken aim at flagging rates on the border as the government prepares a social media campaign to target young people whoÂ haven't been immunised.
node.content:
["Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk has called out the Gold Coast's relatively low\u00a0vaccination rates, saying while there has\u00a0been an increase, the city's residents still need\u00a0\"to lift their game\".", "Her remarks come as the state government prepares\u00a0a social media campaign\u00a0targeting the youth demographic, with schoolies vaccine hubs likely.", "\"They need to really lift their game, like honestly,\" Ms Palaszczuk said.", "\"We're seeing what's happening at the moment in\u00a0Goondiwindi and exactly the same could happen on the Gold Coast.\"", "Border restrictions are due to ease on December 17\u00a0to allow quarantine-free entry for fully vaccinated people.", "
Youth in focus
", "Health department data shows the rate of double vaccinations on the Gold Coast range from about 58 to 68 per cent, depending on the suburb.", "By comparison, Noosa and Caloundra sit at\u00a0about 71 per cent.", "Last month Gold Coast City Council announced an advertising blitz aimed at younger people.", "\"It's particularly difficult,\" Deputy Mayor Donna Gates said.", "\"They don't use mainstream media, so we are working with some ambassadors and we have people from the Titans and the Suns.", "\"We're using Spotify \u2014 we're going to messaging that we know will reach them through channels that they access.\"", "Ms Palaszczuk said until consistent vaccination levels were seen across the country,\u00a0\"only vaccinated people will be able to go to certain venues\".", "\"I don't want to pre-empt\u00a0what's happening in Queensland, but you could see businesses do that,\" she said.", "
Hubs at schoolies
", "Double dose rates for those aged 16-19 in Queensland sit at 42.3 percent, behind 77.2 per cent of those\u00a0aged 60-64.", "Griffith University social marketing associate professor Joy Parkinson said schoolies hubs would make vaccination\u00a0more convenient.", "\"Our young people are becoming increasingly social responsible and socially aware and they want to help other people as well,\" she said.", "Dr Parkinson\u00a0said the government should \"really co-create\" the campaign with young people.", "\"Don't just talk at young people,\" she said.", "\"We know they're not responsive to that and they're also really sceptical about anything that the government says.\"", "", "
How to take a rapid antigen test
"]
